channel.title: Source vs. Client
channel.description:
Ok, so I have a source. There is a run file in there. I have my client and the latter is the same. So do I run both run files at the same time? Or does the client run file not stay open web u run it.
Also, when you a model into a server with the: add model #####, does that then go into your source file when you do that?

item.title: Source vs. Client
item.dc:creator: @Logitek Logitek
item.description:
@Logitek wrote:

i would be suprised if sources nowadays didnt already come with 100% ags so double check yours especially if its delta/PI but if it doesnt, then you would first add the item models, and create the ints client side, then you would add its emotes,specs,damage client side, just use the search bar im sure some1s posted it.

Read full topic

item.title: Source vs. Client
item.dc:creator: @mawang mawang
item.description:
@mawang wrote:

omg sorry guys xD. I meant to say I would like to add an ags to my server. not an age restriction xD. sorry. How do I do that?

-headshot.

Read full topic

item.title: Source vs. Client
item.dc:creator: @Logitek Logitek
item.description:
@Logitek wrote:

mawang:

Ok, but let’s say I want to add a age to my server. Take me through it step by step how. Just the basics on how to.

if you meen what wings said then you would need to integrate your server to a forum like alot of servers do to prevent spam attacks etc. If you dont mean what wings said then wtf are you on about?

Read full topic

item.title: Source vs. Client
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

If you want to play. The client run.bat doesn’t have to be running for others to play, just the server run.bat

Read full topic

item.title: Source vs. Client
item.dc:creator: @mawang mawang
item.description:
@mawang wrote:

So the. I do have to run both of them at the same time?

Read full topic

item.title: Source vs. Client
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

To have your server online, you need to run the run.bat in the server files. The client files run.bat is for you and others to play. And when you add a model, you put the models in the models folder in the client files and the ints (which i’m guessing is the numbers) in the class8.java (if your using delta) if using PI put it in entityDef (Something like that).

Read full topic
